mapper.select: SELECT ZoneSeq, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, Code, EventSeq FROM illegal_zone where ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq} and isDel = 0;

SELECT zone.ZoneSeq, ASTEXT(zone.Polygon) as polygon, zone.isDel, zone.Code, zone.EventSeq FROM illegal_zone zone join illegal_event event on zone.EventSeq = event.EventSeq where event.illegalType = #{illegalEvent.illegalType} and zone.isDel = 0;
SELECT ZoneSeq, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, Code, EventSeq FROM illegal_zone where isDel = 0;
SELECT zone.ZoneSeq, ASTEXT(zone.Polygon) as polygon, zone.isDel, zone.Code, zone.EventSeq FROM illegal_zone WHERE ST_CONTAINS( Polygon, GeomFromText(${latitude} ${longitude}));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO illegal_zone (Polygon, isDel, Code, EventSeq) VALUES (POLYGONFROMTEXT(#{polygon}), #{isDel}, #{code}, #{illegalEvent.eventSeq});
mapper.update: UPDATE illegal_zone SET Polygon = POLYGONFROMTEXT(#{polygon}), IsDel= #{isDel} , Code= #{code}, EventSeq = #{illegalEvent.eventSeq} WHERE ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq};
UPDATE illegal_zone SET EventSeq = #{eventSeq} WHERE ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq};
UPDATE illegal_zone SET isDel = true WHERE ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq};
